Text: Hitler: Memoirs of a Confidant:  A German major general by the end for World War II and, for a period, Wagener was Adolf Hitler's party economist, chief of staff of the SA, and confidant, whose career was derailed by rival Hermann Göring.

Text: Hitler: Memoirs of a Confidant:  His work was not published until seven years after his death, in 1978 in German.
